content: This letter is informing Ugne Karaliute that her application under the EU Settlement Scheme has been successful and she has been granted Indefinite Leave in the United Kingdom under Appendix EU to the Immigration Rules. This means that she has a secure status under UK law and there is no time limit on how long she can stay in the UK. The letter also explains the rights and benefits she will have while in the UK such as the ability to work and access the NHS. The letter also instructs her on how to view and share her status online and provides contact information for the EU Settlement Resolution Centre for any questions or concerns.
